headline: Should You Rethink Edison International After a 28% Drop and Ongoing Wildfire Discussions?
summary: Curious whether Edison International is a steal or overpriced in today’s market? You’re not alone, especially with all the shifting signals this stock is sending. After a relatively flat week with shares down just 0.2%, Edison International has seen modest movement in the past month (up 0.9%), but the year-to-date numbers show a steeper drop of 26.8% and a 28.3% decline over the last year. Recent market conversations have sharpened focus on Edison International’s regulatory landscape and...
